## Appendices


Directions Seven Islands Loop The drive from Knoxville is easy.
Follow I-40 east, until one leaves the interstate at exit 402 and drives around two miles Midway Road.
Here, though brief, the drive can become a bit confusing.
Turn left onto Maple Road, staying on this road for just under one mile.
Then, turn right onto Kodak Road, turning left onto Kelly Road to arrive at the parking lot.
